mapper.select: SELECT id ,title ,start_time ,end_time ,description ,image ,url ,is_in_progress , DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as view_start , DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as view_end FROM events where start_time <= now() and end_time >= now() and is_in_progress is true order by start_time asc
